properties.name: easyeventbus.async-enabled
properties.description: 是否启用异步事件处理

properties.name: easyeventbus.async-thread-pool-size
properties.description: 异步事件处理线程池大小

properties.name: easyeventbus.delayed.enabled
properties.description: 是否启用延迟事件功能

properties.name: easyeventbus.delayed.core-pool-size
properties.description: 延迟事件调度器核心线程池大小

properties.name: easyeventbus.delayed.thread-name-prefix
properties.description: 延迟事件线程名称前缀
